attributes.action: make local authorities recognise child support payments when they calculate student maintance grants for the child in his current family
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a non resident parent supports his or her child either by mutual agreement or through the csa, then this should be recognised by the local authority when assessing a student maintenance grant for the child in their current family.Another example of how the children of non resident parents and the children of non resident parents partners are penalised .firstly their tax credits are used as income when they are young and then when they leave home for university they are fleeced again !!!
